name: Kosmos Below
description:
Dive deep into fast-paced colourful world of Kosmos Below.

Challenge your reflexes in five increasingly fast levels.

Try to reach highest score possible in the intense Overdrive mode.

Lose yourself in awesome soundtrack.

art | code | design

kamil bazydlo

music

conciliator

soundcloud.com/conciliator

main menu music

dominique j. williams

sound

patrick dugan

Controls: mouse-only.

Recommended to play with headphones and fullscreen. You can switch between fullscreen and windowed in settings or pause menus.

Plays great with your monitor in portrait mode.

Enjoy!

Update v1.1:

  • New main menu music added
  • Some gameplay balancing tweaks
